name: Dice Game - Yatzy Edition
description:
All users get +40 Bonus Rolls and no ads!

Try "Yatzy US" - the most addictive Yatzy dice game ever! Join us and take on thousands of players online!

You can play with friends, family, or random opponents - whether they're sitting next to you or thousands of miles away, playing dice has never been more exciting!

===Key Highlights===

• Exciting classic multiplayer Yatzy gameplay.
• Combos similar to poker (three of a kind, four of a kind, straight)
• Challenge friends and family.
• Find thousands of random opponents over the Internet.
• Tournaments with big prizes: 4 types of tournaments!
• Play blitz games for chips!
• Single Player - when you achieve your goal, you earn winnings!
• Activate a bonus roll to get an extra boost right when you need it.
• Personal profile with statistics – both for you and your friends!
• Chat for meeting people and talking to them!
